DOC.criteria: For lean healthy volunteer : 20 subject ( 10 male 10 female ) age 1860 yr. All potential volunteer routine blood test screen hepatic , renal , hematological abnormality . Body mass index < 25Kg/m2 . Female volunteer childbearing potential undergo HCG pregnancy test screening study day . For Obese subject high blood pressure . 20 subject ( 10 male 10 female ) age 1860 yr. All potential volunteer routine blood test screen hepatic , renal , hematological abnormality . Exclusion criterion : Pregnant female Subjects unable give voluntary inform consent Subjects anticoagulant drug anemic Subjects recent medical illness Subjects history coronary heart disease Subjects know kidney liver disease Subjects recent weight loss consume low carbohydrate diet
